references.paper_title: Imagenet classification with deep convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduced AlexNet, a groundbreaking deep convolutional neural network that significantly advanced the field of computer vision and image classification.
This work is a foundational paper in learned image compression, proposing an end-to-end approach that improved upon traditional methods and paved the way for further advancements in the field.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced Stable Diffusion, a groundbreaking generative model that achieved high-resolution image synthesis, significantly improving upon the quality and detail of previous generative models.

references.paper_title: Learned image compression with discretized gaussian mixture likelihoods and attention modules
references.reason: This paper proposed a novel learned image compression method combining discretized Gaussian mixture models and attention modules, leading to improved rate-distortion performance.
This paper introduced Stable Audio, a significant advance in audio compression that provides both high compression ratios and high-fidelity reconstruction
